verses.name: Romans 6:5
verses.text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:

verses.name: Romans 6:6
verses.text: Knowing this, that our old man is crucified with him, that the body of sin might be destroyed, that henceforth we should not serve sin.

verses.name: Romans 6:7
verses.text: For he that is dead is freed from sin.

verses.name: Romans 6:8
verses.text: Now if we be dead with Christ, we believe that we shall also live with him:

verses.name: Romans 6:9
verses.text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more; death hath no more dominion over him.
